title: Roadmap for Music Information ReSearch
segmentation: I always seem to have the thankless task to entertain people before lunch when they have rumbling stomachs, so I'm I'm not going to go into heavy stuff here 'cause we have been doing some very exciting things on how to gather information for the future of this field, and I want to show you those instead of the challenges which I will encourage you to contribute to at the end.

For this.
Future of our research and this was our definition of what we're trying to do, and we were very keen to introduce areas.
Expand the area of music information retrieval with research into multimodal information.

We've obviously done dissemination throughout, but one of the things that we have been working for working on actively has been the new knowledge hubs and spokes.
So special events organized by mirrors to gather information.

We've defined the music information research from 3 perspectives for the purpose of this road map for technical, scientific perspective, which is research aimed at processing music, created digital data with the goal to develop music applications.
This is this is really the classical approach.
There's a social cultural thing which is which is growing area research interests.
It's research aimed at providing music, data and technology to enhance social interactions, cultural exchange and behavioral patterns.

Which of course requires involvement from other fields exploitation, which is research aimed at providing music technology that permits music, industry stakeholders, artists and listeners to listen to easily and intuitively, discover, organize, transform, interact with, and enjoy music in novel ways.
So there is an application application element to this exploitation application and you will see that that's very much part of the.
